Articles.Content:
Added this game to the huge list I have, what a simple, fun, awesome graphics, fantastically designed game

yet hard as hell at times to play.

I luv it.

Having a bit of a challenge getting to orbit the MUN..
Welcome to the forum! The game keeps up its challenge for a while. If you ever find it too easy, see how many times you can go from Kerbin to Eve and back with one ship.

...Having a bit of a challenge getting to orbit the MUN..

Welcone. The tutorial in my signature will guide you through basic vehicle and mission design from a KSC rover to interplanetary spacestations.

Since it goes in a logical sequence Mun orbits (with satellites) are in Chapter 4, manned lunar landings (Minmus is easier than Mun) and interplanetary satellites in Chapter 5.
Welcome to the forum, i wish you greatness and fun
